text:
@realDonaldTrump Hey Dr. Bonespurs,

We are 36th in the world for PER CAPITA testing. You know, PER CAPITA? That's a Latin phrase, just like QUID PRO QUO is.  

PER CAPITA means much more than total number of tests.

Stop twisting the numbers to your favor.

You have failed our country.

#COVID19
